name: 下班（Clocked Out)
description:
下班 （Clocked Out) is a VR visual music experience where, as you head home on the subway after work, your headphones transfer you into a colorful fantasy world. 

Creative Director: Yimin Zhang - email - twitter

Artistic Director: Ivan Tsang - email - twitter

Engineering: (Lead) Ivan Tsang, Huixin Luo, Yimin Zhang

3D Artist: (Lead) Yimin Zhang, Ivan Tsang, Aimee Zhang

Composer: Yimin Zhang

Sound Design:  Xiaoliang Shen, Jinghan Tian

Many thanks to Eric Hanson for his guidance!
